name: part_007
file: tmp_【#湊あくあ卒業ライブ】あくあ色に染まれ！／MinatoAqua Graduation LIVE [fDtUy1PTor0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua and Shirakami Fubuki performing 'Little Busters! ~TV animation ver.~' on stage.
Hoshimachi Suisei, Minato Aqua, and Tokoyami Towa performing 'Summer Time Record' while sitting on stage.

subtitles.original: この輪の中で 気づかないうちに
subtitles.english: Within this wheel, before I even noticed it

subtitles.original: その足は震え出す
subtitles.english: Those legs began to tremble

subtitles.original: 小さな過酷にも
subtitles.english: Even at small hardships

subtitles.original: 僕ら皆同じ夢を見てた
subtitles.english: We were all dreaming the same dream

subtitles.original: 過ぎ去る１ページの...
subtitles.english: A single page that passes by...

subtitles.original: ここからは一冊しか持って行けないよ
subtitles.english: From here on, I can only take one book with me

subtitles.original: それでよかったのかい？
subtitles.english: Was that all right?

subtitles.original: 胸には強さを
subtitles.english: Strength in my heart

subtitles.original: 気高き強さを
subtitles.english: A noble strength

subtitles.original: 頬には涙を
subtitles.english: Tears on my cheeks

subtitles.original: 一滴の涙を
subtitles.english: A single drop of tear

subtitles.original: 高く飛べ 高く冴え 高ければ 高く声を上げ
subtitles.english: Fly high, be sharp and high, if it's high, raise your voice high

subtitles.original: いつか挫けた その日の向こうまで
subtitles.english: Until beyond that day when I once faltered

subtitles.original: 君の声 忘れない
subtitles.english: I won't forget your voice

subtitles.original: 涙も 忘れない
subtitles.english: I won't forget the tears

subtitles.original: これから始まる 希望という名の未来を
subtitles.english: The future called hope that is about to begin

subtitles.original: その足は歩き出す
subtitles.english: Those legs begin to walk

subtitles.original: やがて来る過酷も
subtitles.english: Even the hardships that will eventually come

subtitles.original: 乗り越えてくれるよ
subtitles.english: You'll overcome them

subtitles.original: 信じさせてくれるよ
subtitles.english: You make me believe so

subtitles.original: 昨日も今日も晴天で 入道雲を見ていた
subtitles.english: Yesterday and today were clear skies, and I was watching the cumulonimbus clouds

subtitles.original: 怠いくらいの快晴だ 漫ろに目を閉じて
subtitles.english: The weather's so clear it's almost sluggish, listlessly I close my eyes

subtitles.original: それはどうも簡単に 思い出せやしないようで
subtitles.english: It seems it's not quite so easy to remember

subtitles.original: 年を取った現状に 浸ってたんだよ
subtitles.english: I was soaking in my current state of having aged

subtitles.original: 大人ぶった作戦で 不思議な合図立てて
subtitles.english: With an adult-like strategy, setting a mysterious signal

subtitles.original: 「行こうか、今日も戦争だ」 立ち向かって手を取った
subtitles.english: “Let's go, it's war today too,” we stood up and took each other's hands

subtitles.original: 理不尽なんて当然で 独りぼっち強いられて
subtitles.english: Unreasonableness was a matter of course, and being forced into loneliness

subtitles.original: 迷った僕ら 憂鬱になりそうになってさ
subtitles.english: Lost as we were, we were about to become depressed

subtitles.original: 背高草を分けて 滲む太陽睨んで
subtitles.english: Pushing aside the tall grass, glaring at the blurring sun

subtitles.original: 君はさ、こう言ったんだ 「孤独だったら、おいでよ」
subtitles.english: And you, you said this: “If you're lonely, come here”

subtitles.original: 騒がしさがノックして 生まれた感情さえも
subtitles.english: The noisiness knocked, and even the feelings that were born

subtitles.original: 頭に浮かんでは萎んだ 幻なのかな
subtitles.english: Flickered in my head and then withered, were they just illusions?

subtitles.original: 秘密基地に集まって 「楽しかったね」って単純な
subtitles.english: Gathering in the secret base, just simply saying “That was fun”

subtitles.original: あの頃を思い出して 話をしよう
subtitles.english: Remembering those days, let's talk

subtitles.original: 飛行機雲飛んでって 「眩しいね」って泣いていた
subtitles.english: The contrails flying away, we were crying saying “It's so bright”

subtitles.original: 君はどんな顔だっけ 何故だろう、思い出せないな
subtitles.english: What kind of face did you have? I wonder why, I can't remember
